sourcesContent:
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { MAT_DIALOG_DATA, MatDialogRef } from '@angular/material/dialog'; import { Order } from '../../models/order.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-order-details-dialog', templateUrl: './order-details-dialog.component.html', styleUrls: ['./order-details-dialog.component.css'], }) export class OrderDetailsDialogComponent { constructor( @Inject(MAT_DIALOG_DATA) public data: Order, private dialogRef: MatDialogRef ) {} onClose(): void { this.dialogRef.close(); } } Order Details Order ID: {{ data.orderId }}

person Customer Details

Name: {{ data.customerDetails.name }}

Email: {{ data.customerDetails.email }}

Phone: {{ data.customerDetails.phoneNumber }}

event Order Details

Order Date: {{ data.orderDate | date: 'medium' }}

Delivery Date: {{ data.deliveryDate | date: 'medium' }}

Status: {{ data.status }}

straighten Measurement Details

Gender: {{ data.measurementDetails.gender }}

Category: {{ data.measurementDetails.category }}

Design: {{ data.measurementDetails.design }}

Measurements: {{ data.measurementDetails.measurements }}

Price: {{ data.measurementDetails.price | currency }}
